config.script:
queryPath = "app/Schedule/editProductCode"
	
	
	params = {
		"productCodeID": self.view.custom.ProductCodeID,
		"productCode": self.view.custom.ProductCode,
		"description": self.view.custom.Description,
		"enabled": self.view.custom.Enabled,
		"idealRunRate": self.view.custom.IdealRunRate,
		"rateUoM": self.view.custom.UoM,
		"perUnitCost": float(self.view.custom.PerUnitCost),
		"instructions": self.view.custom.Instructions
	}
		
	system.db.runNamedQuery(queryPath, params)
	system.perspective.sendMessage("addedPC")
	system.perspective.closePopup(self.view.params.ModalName)

DisabledPopup.message: Please sign in as quarterback to proceed.
DisabledPopup.title: Invalid Permissions

DisabledPopup.message: Please sign in as quarterback to proceed.
